description:
Almost 2,000 happy students are taking my courses right now!

** Updated February 2015 **

So, you're getting ready to launch your first Amazon Kindle book. OR, you've launched books without much success and you're at a loss as to how to get SALES on your books!

Listen, writing a book is hard work! You put blood - well, maybe not actual blood - sweat and tears into writing those words, so you want someone (or lots of someones) to read them, right?

Unfortunately, many authors go belly up when their book is published. Why? There's one main reason that I've seen as I've taught thousands of people how to self publish their books - LACK OF MARKETING.

Either they don't understand HOW to market effectively OR they don't even try. In order to be truly successful, you must learn how to properly LAUNCH and MARKET your books!

In this course, I'm going to give you idea after idea that you can easily and quickly implement before and during your book launch. You won't have to guess what to do because all of the ideas will be right there waiting for you to use!

To get started, simply click the TAKE THIS COURSE button at the top right of this page!
title: Fiction Marketing - Amazon Kindle Launch Plan
